name: Sekibanki's Headless Horseman Training
description:
HOW TO PLAY

  • Left/Right Arrows - Balance
  • Z - Eat Candies (Not parrying I swear)
  • Space - Jump over Candies (If you're not good at parrying
  • Collect EXP and buy upgrades to up your Headless Horseman game!

It's almost Halloween in Gensokyo, Kagerou and Wakasagihime come to Sekibanki with a weird request to dress up as the Headless Horseman. Fitting as it may be, Sekibanki doesn't know how to ride a horse! Help Sekibanki practice jockey skills while collecting candy in preparation for the gang's trick-or-treating ventures.

This Touhou fan game was made partially as a tribute to Flash-era games in the style of Learn to Fly and Toss the Turtle.

Made for the 5th Touhou Game Jam, many of us were busy with life over the 72hr period so this is all we could put together!

CREDITS:

Programming/Animations: Brogrammist AKA Jacky Yang

Art/Programming: Bakaretsu

Art: Daiyan (Twitter)

Music: InSuccession

Sounds: Nick Brake
